entities.name: grimmauld place
entities.description: The location where Harry saw the door with a serpent door knocker. ("And then he saw the door of number twelve, Grimmauld Place...")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is grabbing Harry's hand to prevent him from doing something. ("Hermione’s hand was suddenly vicelike upon his hand...")

relationships.description: Hermione is at Grimmauld Place. ("...and Hermione’s hand was suddenly vicelike upon his hand and everything went dark again.")
